properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rivers of living water Rivers of life so free Flowing from Thee my Savior Send now the rivers through me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rivers of living water Rivers that flow from the throne Rivers o'er flowing with blessing Coming from Jesus alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Whoso is thirsty come hither Here is abundant supply Water transparent as crystal Come without money and buy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cleanse me oh cleanse me my Savior Make me a channel today Empty me fill me and use me Teach me to trust and obey{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then and then only Lord Jesus Through me the rivers can flow Thus and thus only will others Learn Thy great fullness to know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I surrender to Jesus Here I lay all at His feet Anything anywhere only Just for His service made meet{/lang-eng}
